item.title: By: velda
item.dc:creator: velda
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/2010/07/13/speckle-may/#comment-3479">Joseph Scott</a>.
Ah, so their tickets are still $1.50 for the most part -- just not on weekend evenings. Good to know :) The kids and I have been there several times. Last time I went though, I came with just enough cash for three $1.50 tickets, and ended up $1.50 short. Not as much fun.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Joseph Scott.

item.title: By: Joseph Scott
item.dc:creator: Joseph Scott
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/2010/07/13/speckle-may/#comment-3478">velda</a>.
Good to know. This is the cheap seats theater near us - http://www.cinemark.com/theater_showtimes.asp?theater_id=61 - I've been there a few times, nice enough place.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to velda.

Good to know. This is the cheap seats theater near us – http://www.cinemark.com/theater_showtimes.asp?theater_id=61 – I’ve been there a few times, nice enough place.

item.title: By: velda
item.dc:creator: velda
item.description: There's a super cool theater in PG that gets the movies a few weeks after they've come out. They have stadium seating & are a bit nicer than the dollar theaters (that now charge $2 per ticket, iirc) and they only charge $3 per ticket. Snacks are super cheap too. If it'd be worth the extra $ and the drive to you guys, I'll let you know when it gets there.
item.content:encoded: There’s a super cool theater in PG that gets the movies a few weeks after they’ve come out. They have stadium seating & are a bit nicer than the dollar theaters (that now charge $2 per ticket, iirc) and they only charge $3 per ticket. Snacks are super cheap too. If it’d be worth the extra $ and the drive to you guys, I’ll let you know when it gets there.

item.description:
In reply to <a href="/2010/07/13/speckle-may/#comment-3476">velda</a>.
No, probably going to wait until it gets to the cheap seats.

In reply to velda.

No, probably going to wait until it gets to the cheap seats.
